press_button_alternatively.description: Press the button alternatively in a pattern to select different coffee settings.

press_button.description: Press the button to start the coffee brewing process.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functioning.

rotate_knob_counter-clockwise.description: Rotate the knob counter-clockwise to modify the coffee strength.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob as per the needed setting.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure it is free from any dirt or grime.

slide_out_container_halfway.description: Slide the container halfway out of the coffee machine for a quick clean.

clean_container_inside.description: Slide out the container, clean it properly from inside and then slide it back in.

slide_out_container.description: Slide the container out of the coffee machine.

slide_in_container.description: Slide the container back into the coffee machine.

clean_container.description: Clean the container thoroughly to remove any coffee residue.

clean_lid_from_inside.description: Open the lid, clean from inside and then close it back.

clean_lid_rims.description: Open the lid, carefully clean the rims and then close it back.

open_lid.description: Lift the lid on top of the coffee machine for refilling water or coffee beans.

close_lid.description: Close the lid after refilling water or coffee beans.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid to maintain it dirt-free and hygienic.

clean_coffee_machine_sides.description: Carefully clean the sides of the coffee machine to remove any coffee stains or splashes.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the coffee machine to keep it tidy and clean.

clean_everything_except_knob.description: Clean the entire coffee machine, except the knob, which includes container, lid, button, and body.

clean_whole_coffeemachine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine, including knob, container, lid, button, and body.
